question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. mini golf court
B. man wearing black hat
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The mini golf court is in the foreground, with its green surface and orange holes clearly visible and occupying a significant portion of the lower right of the frame, while the man in the black hat is further back in the scene.
